reviewText: Very good story. And the Erotic scenes are incredible.

One is married, but get no action so she is a real cougar, one is a widow and won't get it on since her husband lives in her heart. The male has to be taught all things, and eventually comes around. It has a slight twist in the ending but not one that is terrible, had to laugh with some of the things shown.

when I bought this I didn't know what I was getting into it has to be one of the amazing things I've seen in awhile it's a story to tell you that love never dies and there will always be someone there for you
